seo.title: Privacy Policy | Cutly
seo.description: Privacy policy for the Cutly mobile app

title: Privacy Policy
intro: This Privacy Policy describes how the Cutly mobile application (the “App”, “we”, “our service”) collects, uses, and protects users’ personal data.
By using the App, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.

2.title: Data created while using the app

3.title: Technical and analytics data
items: crash, performance, and feature usage data

2.title: Services and technologies we use
2.intro: To operate the App, we may use third-party services:

1.title: Supabase
1.note: Supabase processes data in accordance with GDPR requirements and applies modern security measures.

2.title: Firebase (Google)
2.note: Firebase may collect technical data, including device identifiers and information about interactions with the app.

3.title: Artificial intelligence (AI)
3.lead: The App uses AI algorithms to:
items: build menus and generate dish images
3.note: For this purpose, user preferences and data entered in the App may be processed. AI processing is not used for automated decision-making that produces legal effects.

4.title: Advertising services (Ads)
4.note: We do not share personal data such as name or email with advertisers.

3.title: How we use data
3.intro: Collected data is used only for the following purposes:
items: providing and supporting the app’s functionality
3.note: We do not sell users’ personal data.

4.title: Sharing data with third parties
4.intro: Data may be shared only with third parties necessary to operate the App, including:
4.note: Data sharing is carried out in accordance with GDPR and applicable law.

5.title: Data storage and security
5.p1: We apply technical and organizational measures to protect data from unauthorized access, loss, or modification.
5.p2: Data is stored only for as long as necessary to achieve the purposes described in this Policy.

6.title: Account and data deletion
6.p1: You have the right to delete your account at any time.
6.note: After account deletion, all associated personal data will be deleted or anonymized, except where retention is required by law.

7.title: Your rights (GDPR)
items: request correction or deletion of data
7.note: To exercise these rights, you can contact us using the details below.

8.title: Children
8.p1: The App is not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect children’s personal data.

9.title: Changes to this Privacy Policy
9.p1: We may update this Privacy Policy. The current version is always available on this page.

10.title: Contact information
10.p1: If you have any questions, you can contact us:

11.title: Jurisdiction
11.p1: This Privacy Policy is governed by European Union law (GDPR) and applicable national laws.
